ChatBot documentation¶

This documentation describes the structure and functionality of the ChatBot application.

UML Class Diagram¶

Modules¶

chat_gui_app.py

Main graphical user interface (GUI) for the chatbot application. Integrates user interaction, language switching, message processing, and AI integration through an API. Uses Tkinter for GUI components.

main.apply_uppercase()[source]¶

Convert all messages in chat to uppercase.

main.countdown(n: int) → list[str][source]¶

Recursive countdown generator for /countdown command.

main.display_chat() → None[source]¶

Update the chat display with the current conversation.

main.filter_user_msgs()[source]¶

Filter the conversation to include only user messages.

main.get_translation(key: str) → str[source]¶

Fetch localized UI string based on the current language.

main.log_call(func)[source]¶

Decorator that logs function calls for debugging.

main.perform_search()[source]¶

Search for a keyword in messages and show matching results.

main.save_as_docx(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶
main.save_as_txt(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶
main.save_using_class()[source]¶

Save conversation using an OOP-style TxtSaver class.

main.send_message() → None[source]¶

Handle message submission, including custom commands and API call.

main.show_char_count()[source]¶

Display total number of characters in the conversation.

main.show_unique_speakers()[source]¶

Display a list of unique speakers.

main.switch_language() → None[source]¶

Toggle the UI language between Polish and English.

main.update_labels() → None[source]¶

Update all UI labels based on the selected language.
